title: Which explains why travelers suffer from jet lag

content.question: Which of the following is an explanation of why travelers suffer from jet lag?

choices.label: They experience an increase in REM rebound.
There is a decrease in the duration of brain waves in sleep.
They experience excess amounts of NREM sleep.
There is a disruption in their circadian rhythm.

content.answer: There is a disruption in their circadian rhythm.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
